name: Sisulizer Package File
summary: Learn about .SLE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: Compressed package file saved by Sisulizer, a visual software localization tool; contains the exchange project file and other files needed by the translator; similar to a .SLP file, but is compressed using .ZIP compression.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .sle file in Steganos Safe 21
images.caption: SLE file open in Steganos Safe 21
